comments: Gives great feedback and cares. If you are taking the online class, be prepared for a lot of reading and writing. She gives interesting books to read and great discussion questions to answer. Great Professor overall.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Caring (4)  Inspirational (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Hilarious (2)  Respected (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  GET READY TO READ
comments: 3 multiple discussion boards per week along with two responses per discussion board. Gets exhausting. minimum of 300 words for discussion board and 150 words for responses. If you\'re a writer at heart then you\'ll be fine. If you hate writing don\'t bother.

comments: Professor Cassidy was one of the greatest teachers I have ever had!! Shes sweet and funny and makes writing so worth it. She makes classes fun.. I passed the CATW because of her! I came to BMCC knowing nothing really I barely had my GED and couldn\'t write one well organized paragraph, she was extremely helpful!!! I love her! Take! *****

comments: The best English professor I\'ve had at BMCC. Professor Cassidy is the friendliest, encouraging, funny instructor ever. She makes the class interesting.
